snippet: Wisconsin hired Paul Chryst away from Pittsburgh to replace Gary Andersen, who had left for Oregon State, as coach, the university announced Wednesday.
abstract: Wisconsin hires football coach Paul Chryst away from Pittsburgh to replace Gary Andersen, who left for Oregon State.
lead_paragraph: Wisconsin hired Paul Chryst away from Pittsburgh to replace Gary Andersen, who had left for Oregon State, as coach, the university announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Wisconsin Hires an Alumnus as Its Coach
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Hires an Alumnus as Its Coach
